events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and their resume looks promising with relevant experience.
The candidateâ€™s application has been categorised under 'Engineering' due to their background as a software developer and experience with devops tools.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to follow up with the candidate and coordinate the next steps.
The initial screening call was conducted successfully; the candidate demonstrated strong communication skills and a good understanding of software engineering principles.
Candidate responded promptly with enthusiasm about the role and availability for further interviews, expressing keen interest in the engineering position.
Technical interview has been scheduled for next week with the lead developer to assess the candidate's coding and problem-solving skills.
